creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: portion of a boat shown at L with man sitting on prow near lower center of image; buildings along opposite shore in middle ground with willow trees near L; another boat with silhouetted passengers near middle
marks:
Signature

in graphite on verso: P 1711 | 76/77- signed in graphite on tab at bottom edge, at left:
provenance: [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York, until November 16, 1985; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Battersea from Chelsea
